pageContext.claim: “It's fake news, so much of it. It is truly dishonest news. It's corrupt news. And I can't be strong enough. I used to say fake but now I'm going well beyond the word fake. And if you were in my position where you know the truth, in other words, you know the truth. A lot of people, they watch and they really don't know exactly what's going -- so when they see it, they assume it's true.”
pageContext.analysis: Traditional news organizations such as The Washington Post or New York Times do not invent news sources or sources.
